Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: voiceNoteToPlay
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This is an audio player that queues up the voice note associated with a particular route landmark. The player is created whenever a saved route is loaded. Loading it before the user clicks the Play Voice Note button allows us to call the prepareToPlay function which reduces the latency when the user clicks the Play Voice Note button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Clew@o.name: playSound()

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Play the specified system sound. If the system sound has been preloaded as an audio player, then play using the AVAudioSession. If there is no corresponding player, use the AudioServicesPlaySystemSound function.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: delayTransition(announcement:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Called when the UI of the view changes dramatically (e.g., if a different subview is displayed). The optional announcement input is will be spoken 2 seconds after the transition occurs. The delay is necessary to prevent the accessibility notification for screen changed to cut off the announcement.

Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.abstract: Recursively simplifies a path of points using Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm.

Classes/SavedRoute.html#/s:4Clew10SavedR.abstract: The crumbs that make up the route. The densely sampled positions (crumbs) are stored and the keypoints (sparser goal positionsare calculated on demand when navigation is requested.

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: Get the heading for the phone suitable for computing directions to the next waypoint.

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Create the object by loading the saved routes from the URL returned by getRoutesURL()

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: archive(route:worldMapAsAny:)
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Save the specified route with the optional ARWorldMap. The variable class attribute routes will automatically be updated by this function.

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: unarchiveMap(id:)
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Load the map from the app’s local storage. If we are on a platform that doesn’t support ARWorldMap, this function always returns nil

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: window
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: A handle to the app’s main window

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: application(_:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the app finishes launching. Currently, this is where we setup Firebase and make sure the phone screen doesn’t lock while we are using the app.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationWillResignActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Sent when the application is about to move from active to inactive state. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationDidEnterBackground(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: This method is called when the app is entering the background. This is where timerss should be invalidated and shared resources should be relinquished. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationDidBecomeActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the application becomes active. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationWillTerminate(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the application becomes is about to terminate. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html.name: AppDelegate
Classes/AppDelegate.html.abstract: This class handles various state changes for the app.

Classes/DataPersistence.html.name: DataPersistence
Classes/DataPersistence.html.abstract: This class handles saving and loading routes.

Classes/HelpViewController.html.name: HelpViewController
Classes/HelpViewController.html.abstract: The view controller for the help dialog. This is a thin wrapper on top of WKWebView, which displays the main content.

Classes/Navigation.html.name: Navigation
Classes/Navigation.html.abstract: Navigation class that provides direction information given 2 LocationInfo position

Classes/LocationInfo.html.name: LocationInfo
Classes/LocationInfo.html.abstract: Struct to store position information and yaw. By sub-classing ARAnchor, we get specify the 6-DOFs of an ARAnchor while getting the ability to support the secure coding protocol for free.

Classes/RouteLandmark.html.name: RouteLandmark
Classes/RouteLandmark.html.abstract: An encapsulation of a route landmark, including position, text, and audio information.

Classes/SavedRoute.html.name: SavedRoute
Classes/SavedRoute.html.abstract: This class encapsulates a route that can be persisted to storage and reloaded as needed.

Classes/PathFinder.html.name: PathFinder
Classes/PathFinder.html.abstract: Pathfinder class calculates turns or keypoints given a path array of LocationInfo

Classes/PathLogger.html.name: PathLogger
Classes/PathLogger.html.abstract: A class to handle logging app usage data

Classes/RouteTableViewCell.html.name: RouteTableViewCell
Classes/RouteTableViewCell.html.abstract: A table cell that holds the route data

Classes/RoutesViewController.html.name: RoutesViewController
Classes/RoutesViewController.html.abstract: The view controller that handles the saved routes view

Classes/RingBuffer.html.name: RingBuffer
Classes/RingBuffer.html.abstract: A generic RingBuffer that supports some basic operations

Classes/ViewController.html.name: ViewController
Classes/ViewController.html.abstract: The view controller that handles the main Clew window. This view controller is always active and handles the various views that are used for different app functionalities.

Classes/RecorderViewController.html.name: RecorderViewController
Classes/RecorderViewController.html.abstract: The view controller for the audio recorder

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
